thought.text: Now I need to modify the `modify_field_list` function to use this new function and pass the app context so we can access the type aliases:

action.old_str:
for field_list in field_lists:
            modify_field_list(field_list, annotations[fullname])
action.new_str:
for field_list in field_lists:
            modify_field_list(field_list, annotations[fullname], app.config.autodoc_type_aliases)

function.arguments: {"command": "str_replace", "path": "/tmp/tmpf25j40i4/sphinx/sphinx/ext/autodoc/typehints.py", "old_str": "        for field_list in field_lists:\n            modify_field_list(field_list, annotations[fullname])", "new_str": "        for field_list in field_lists:\n            modify_field_list(field_list, annotations[fullname], app.config.autodoc_type_aliases)", "security_risk": "LOW"}
function.name: str_replace_editor
